question: Which among the following is considered to be the oldest Veda?
explanation: There are four Vedas composed by Aryans â€“ Rig Veda, Sam Veda, Yajur Veda and Atharva Veda. Of the four Vedas, the Rig veda (collection of lyrics) is the oldest text in the world and is also known as the first testament of mankind. It contains 1028 hymns, divided into 10 mandals.
